text: Lugny-Champagne is a commune. It is in Centre-Val de Loire in the Cher department in central France. In 2020, 136 people lived there. == Sights == * The church of St. Fiacre, dating from the 15th century * The ch√¢teau de Billeron, dating from the 18th century == References == Category:Communes in Cher
